title: Finding the Light
description: A collection of thoughtful verse. Bobbie Coelho turned to poetry when she was diagnosed with Parkinson's disease. This collection features a mixture of themes, both sad and light-hearted. The poems urge the reader to reflect on the durability of the human spirit and the love that it engenders, and to refrain from judging others from their superficial exterior.
author: Bobbie Coelho
